title: The Principles of Strength (typo?)

embed.description: My name is Alyssa Roshka Gloriana val-Lokan.

body:
There is a typo in the new story about Noxus. How do i contact the people who do the writing to let them know? see below:

"Alyssa steadied her breathing, trying to slow her racing heart. Her hands were clammy. She wiped them on her cloak.
Waiting was** the** always the worst part."

I think the first "the" shouldn't be in that last sentence.

replies.body:
We're on it.  Slowly, but we _are_ on it :)  Sorry!

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/fO1TrOw8-a-couple-typos-in-the-principles-of-strength-story

(If you want a challenge, there is one other typo in the story that player Sumerska found, if you want to test yourself.  Hopefully there'll be fewer such 'fun puzzles' in the future )
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XXAO1XAY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-12T22:41:22.072+0000)
>
> We're on it.  Slowly, but we _are_ on it :)  Sorry!
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/fO1TrOw8-a-couple-typos-in-the-principles-of-strength-story
> 
> (If you want a challenge, there is one other typo in the story that player Sumerska found, if you want to test yourself.  Hopefully there'll be fewer such 'fun puzzles' in the future )
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

We got  your back bro. You just tell the team to keep up the good work
